lead_paragraph: Jack Butland's performances this season merit a new and improved contract despite the goalkeeper already committing his future to Stoke City until 2019, manager Mark Hughes has said.

headline.print_headline: Butland in Line for New Stoke Contract, Says Hughes
headline.main: Butland in Line for New Stoke Contract, Says Hughes

snippet: Jack Butland's performances this season merit a new and improved contract despite the goalkeeper already committing his future to Stoke City until 2019, manager Mark Hughes has said....
